TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi PrintServer extends System.Printing.PrintSystemObject

summary.span: 在打印服务器（通常是一台计算机，但也可能是专用硬件打印服务器设备）上管理打印队列。

span.span: Manages the print queues on a print server, which is usually a computer, but can be a dedicated hardware print server appliance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你的程序将值写入的属性，更改已不起作用，直到它将传递给由计算机对象。When your program writes a value to a property of , that change has no effect until it is passed on to the computer that is represented by the object. 若要提交更改，请使用对象的方法。To commit changes, use the method for the object. 同样，其他应用程序可能会更改计算机的实际打印服务属性。Similarly, other applications may change the actual print service properties of the computer. 若要确保为您的程序的对象具有的最新值，请使用对象的方法。To make sure that the object for your program has the latest values, use the method for the object. > [!CAUTION] > 类中命名空间不支持的 Windows 服务或 ASP.NET 应用程序或服务中的使用。Classes within the namespace are not supported for use within a Windows service or ASP.NET application or service. 尝试使用这些应用程序类型之一中的这些类可能会产生意外的问题，如降低服务性能和运行时异常。Attempting to use these classes from within one of these application types may produce unexpected problems, such as diminished service performance and run-time exceptions. 如果你想要从 Windows 窗体应用程序打印，请参阅命名空间。If you want to print from a Windows Forms application, see the namespace. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建的实例。The following example shows how to create an instance of . [!code-csharp[PrintServerCreate#_CreatePrintServer](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PrintServerCreate/CSharp/PrintServerCreate.cs#_createprintserver)] [!code-vb[PrintServerCreate#_CreatePrintServer](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PrintServerCreate/visualbasic/printservercreate.vb#_createprintserver)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Commit() cil managed

summary.span: 提交程序对打印服务器对象属性的所有更改，方法是将这些更改写入此对象表示的打印服务器。

span.span: Commits any changes that your program made to the properties of the print server object by writing them to the print server that the object represents.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法要求对象创建与权限。The method requires that the object be created with rights.

span.span: Some of the properties are not committed.
Some of the properties could not be committed.

span.span: \- or - The object was not created with sufficient rights.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此方法 (在调用继承中的方法的对象) 若要在其属性与现有打印机仅在位置、 端口和共享的状态中安装第二个打印机不同。The following example shows how to use this method (called on the object that inherits the method from ) to install a second printer that differs in its properties from an existing printer only in location, port, and shared status. [!code-csharp[ClonePrinter#ClonePrinter](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ClonePrinter/CSharp/Program.cs#cloneprinter)] [!code-vb[ClonePrinter#ClonePrinter](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ClonePrinter/visualbasic/program.vb#cloneprinter)]

The newly created .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你不想要初始化的队列的所有三个， ，或属性; 您可以为一个或多个传递空字符串`printQueueShareName`， `printQueueComment`，和`printQueueLocation`。If you do not want to initialize all three of the queue's , , or properties; you can pass an empty string for one or more of `printQueueShareName`, `printQueueComment`, and `printQueueLocation`. 如果你想要初始化仅其中一个属性，使用此方法的重载。If you want to initialize just one of these properties, use the overload of this method.

summary.span: 获取或设置管理打印机端口 I/O 的进程的线程优先级别。

span.span: Gets or sets the thread priority for the process that manages I/O through the printer ports.

value.span: 一个 枚举值，标识管理打印机端口的进程的线程优先级别。

span.span: A enumeration value that identifies the thread priority for the process that manages the printer ports.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 服务器的端口线程读取假脱机文件、 处理数据，并将数据发送到端口监视器，然后将数据发送到打印机。The port thread for the server reads the spool file, processes the data, and sends the data to a port monitor, which then sends the data to the printer.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Refresh() cil managed

summary.span: 更新 对象的属性，以使各属性值与此对象表示的打印服务器的相应特性值一致。

span.span: Updates the properties of the object so that each property value matches the corresponding attribute value of the print server that the object represents.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性所做的任何更改时可以丢失方法执行。Any changes that you make to the properties of a can be lost when the method executes. 如果你没有尚未编写所做的更改到打印服务器与该对象表示，则会发生这种丢失。This loss occurs if you did not yet write the changes to the print server that the object represents with .

span.span: Some of the properties cannot be refreshed.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示用户在已启用打印机池的情况下发生错误后是否可重新启动作业。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether users can restart jobs after an error occurs if printer pooling is enabled.

value.span: 如果启用打印机池后可重新启动作业，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if jobs can be restarted when printer pooling is enabled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用程序必须具有管理权限才能将此值设置。A calling program must have administrative permissions to set this value.

value.span: 作业重新启动之前的等待时间（以分钟为单位）。

span.span: The wait time, in minutes, before a job restarts.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用程序必须具有管理权限才能将此值设置。A calling program must have administrative permissions to set this value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在实践中，此属性的值始终是相同的值只不过后者是一种类型。In practice, the value of this property is always the same as the value of except that the latter is a type .
